website_summaries.verdict: The best radiator testing kit with the most convenience and compatibility.
pros: Allows you to easily test for leakage in radiator
Radiator caps come color-coded to easily find the right adapter for your particular model
Includes several options for older and imported car models
cons: Several of the adapters are not compatible with American-made automotive brands

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for many vehicles but mainly for GM ...

I feel ripped off.Why would this kit not have a very common vehicle fitting?? Why can't I contact the company? customer_reviews.author: Erik W.

customer_reviews.title: Very useful tool, almost every thing you need for radiator service.
customer_reviews.text: A very good radiator service kit. I will probably never use every cap they provided, but the system works excellent. I have serviced 7 radiators with this kit since I bought it and I a certain it has prevented me from two come-back issues because I was able to find the root problem, not just the customer reported symptom. I did have to buy an adapter to service 1 inch deep filler necks and caps.
customer_reviews.author: Mashka

customer_reviews.title: Best pressure testi kit I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I own a repair shop and we have been searching for a good pressure testing kit for a long time. We have tried out several different brands over the years and never had much luck. They were either hard to use, didn't work well or didn't have the adapter we needed. So far this kit has been excellent. We bought the few extra adapters that don't come in the kit. So far we have used it on multiple years and models of Jaguar, Land Rover, Audi, BMW, Mercedes, VW, MINI, Lexus, Acura, Bentley, Volvo, and Porsche. Has worked perfect everytime. Couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Wish it worked like everyone else's
customer_reviews.text: I love astros equipment but I just cannot get this thing to fill a system without introducing air. It pulls a vacuum fine and flattens the hoses but filling is a different story. The pressure tester works great and all the caps seem to be air tight as far as I can tell. I'm going to re teflon all my fittings and maybe retry it but I've gone back to my lisle no spill funnel for filling and bleeding for the meantime.

customer_reviews.title: Must for mechanics

customer_reviews.title: Poor instructions for those unfamiliar with tools of this type.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly complete kit although it seems to lack a couple of adapters for late model Ford and GM products which are are available as "accessories". The build quality seems pretty good for an imported tool so I'll give it 5 stars for now.

customer_reviews.title: Product Good, but Too Many Useless Adpaters in the Kit for North American Cars
customer_reviews.text: The good is that it works. It rarely leaks unless you move the connector too much so it is fairly reliable at providing leak results. The vacuum filler work impressively, too. While I recommend the product and brand, I don't recommend the kit. The reason is that 3 of the adapters do almost all the cars in North America. The remaining dozen or so adapter are for car manufacturers I have never heard of. Perhaps there are utility vehicles and trucks that these can work with, but most automobiles only use the 3 main sizes. All the adapters are there but I did have to make one with a pipe in order to do one test.

product_meta.title: Astro Pneumatic Tool 78585 Universal Radiator Pressure Tester & Vacuum Type Cooling System Kit
product_meta.description:
This “Radiator Pressure Tester And Vacuum Type Cooling System Kit” allows easy testing for leakage in radiator system and quick change of coolant. Its color coded radiator test caps make it easy to choose the suitable test cap for the job. The set includes: pressure testing pump with hose, quick coupler with pressure release, and gauge: test range 0 - 35 psi (0 - 2.5 bar), (1) blue and (1) black radiator cap test adapters to test for original radiator cap leakage, (17) test caps for testing cooling systems on most domestic and import vehicles, vacuum type cooling system purge and refill tool kit for quick change of coolant, universal adapter and temperature gauge.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Astro Pneumatic 78585 - Radiator Pressure Tester & Vacuum Type Cooling System Kit with 78581 Adapter allows easy testing for leakage in radiator system and quick change of coolant. Color coded radiator test caps make it easy to choose the suitable test cap for the job and special design of vacuum purge & refill tool connection fits nearly all types of radiator opening. Unit is suitable for domestic and import vehicles. Set includes: Pressure Testing Pump with Hose, Quick Coupler with Pressure Release, and Gauge - Test Range 0 - 35 psi (0 - 2.5 bar); 1-Piece. Blue and 1-Piece. Black Radiator Cap Test Adapters to test for original radiator cap leakage; 17-Pieces. Test Caps for testing cooling systems on most domestic and import vehicles; Vacuum Type Cooling System Purge and Refill Tool Kit for quick change of coolant; Universal Adapter; Temperature Gauge and Blow Molded Case.
